verbs.description: GENEVA ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's top health official] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that the U.S. and global partners will " take the steps necessary " to try to contain a new Ebola outbreak] ,
